text: William Norman "Tiny" Sailes (25 June 1920 – 27 December 2012) was a Fleet Air Arm pilot of the Second World War who was awarded the Distinguished Service Cross for his part in the attack on the German U-boat base at Kilbotn in Norway on 4 May 1945. The attack was the last British air raid of the war.Lt- Cdr Norman Sailes. The Telegraph, 14 January 2013. Retrieved 27 May 2015.On this day 4 May 1945. Fleet Air Arm Officers Association, 4 May 2014. title: Norman Sailes
